definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.chinese: 這些人排成一列排隊一聲不吭地出發了。

sentences.english: He bore the pain without a word of complaint.
sentences.chinese: 他一聲不吭地忍住了疼痛。

sentences.english: Tom didn't speak. He sat on the stone, very still , as well as held back to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆忍住笑意，一聲不吭，坐在石頭上一動也不動。

sentences.english: He walked off without any word when he heard the news.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這個消息他一聲不吭地離開了。

sentences.english: They are too engrossed to talk.
sentences.chinese: 她們全神貫注一聲不吭。

sentences.english: He had controlled himself with extreme effort and suffered in silence.
sentences.chinese: 他一聲不吭，以極大的毅力默默忍受着疼痛。

sentences.english: Harriet kissed her hand in silent and submissive gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 哈麗特一聲不吭，帶着馴順的感激之情吻了吻她的手。

sentences.english: The black knight did not speak, nor did he threaten the prince in any way.
sentences.chinese: 黑騎士一聲不吭，也沒有擺出任何威脅王子的姿態。

sentences.english: Old John stood there speechless , for he is burning with anger.
sentences.chinese: 老約翰一聲不吭的站在那裏，因爲他正怒火中燒。

sentences.english: He sits silent in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在角落裏一聲不吭。

sentences.english: He man, silent, stood beside her.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人一聲不吭，站在她旁邊。

sentences.english: Say a grandmother whole day ash face to sit 1 to don't utter inthe yard.
sentences.chinese: 說奶奶整天灰着臉坐在院子裏一聲不吭。

sentences.english: I asked him for his down jacket, which he doffed without a word and tossed to me.
sentences.chinese: 我問他要他的夾克，他一聲不吭地脫下來扔給了我。

sentences.english: The boy submitted to the punishment without a sound.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子甘受處罰，一聲不吭。

sentences.english: He sat there without saying a word.
